fullForm: Birla Institute of Technology and Science Admission Test - Bachelor of Pharmacy
conductingBody: Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS), Pilani
eligibility: Candidates must have passed the 12th examination from a recognized Central or State board or its equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, and Biology. Adequate proficiency in English is also required. Candidates with PCM may also apply for the Pharmacy program.
negativeMarking: 1 mark will be deducted for each incorrect answer.

faqs.question: What is the mode of BITSAT BPharm exam?
faqs.answer: BITSAT BPharm is conducted as a computer-based test (CBT) at designated centers.
